Description: WE ARE FLORIDA'S OLDEST VINTAGE GUITAR SHOP ! 1983 Gibson Les Paul Std "Special Order" a very special ordered Les Paul ! This is a stunning example of what Gibson was doing prior to moving from Kalamazoo beautiful Tobacco Sunburst finish over a very pretty flamey maple top, 1 piece mahog'ny body & neck (1st year post maple necks), it has a set of 2 fantastic "Pat.App.For" stickered “Tim Shaw” pickups, its pot date codes to the 40th week of 1983, nice cream pickgard & pickup surrounds, cool gold speed knobs, what sets this apart is its rare factory installation of a Kahler (by Gibson) Tremolo system, all original excellent shape overall, a rare & cool Les Paul that’s already 35 years young, comes w/a nice original hard case.
Title: 1983 Gibson Les Paul Std. "Special Order" last of the Kalamazoo made guitars !
